content.rendered:
The Grim Woods Raid Den is in the upper-left corner of the Grim Woods area. This raid den can be accessed by solving the pressure plate puzzle in the bottom-right corner of the area.

Location

Raid Pokémon

Pokémon Star Level

Butterfree 3-Star, 4-Star, and 5-Star

Dottler 2-Star
